video_title: Deli Gong - Ethereumâ€™s future hinges on TEEs
description: Ethereum can benefit from the hardware-based guarantees of TEEs, but community skepticism could be hindering its adoption. TEEs have real-world impact today and will bring about more practical applications with trusted hardware at its core.
